name: From Death Till Dawn
description:
Hello!

Are you ready to kill zombies? 

Find the zombies and clear the area of them! Sound simple right? But is it?

In this game, you can use different weapons and explosives to reach the goal.

This FPS is a prototype created for our group assignment during our course a year ago. My responsibility in the group was programming the gameplay.

Due to the workload on other/new course assignments, this game probably will not be updated further but any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Controls:

WSAD - Move

Shift - Sprint

E - Pick up

Z, X - Use healing items

R - Switch between machete/guns

Q - Switch between guns

F - Drop current gun

Left Mouse Button - shoot/attack

Right Mouse Button - Throw grenade
